languages.text: "Мне нравится имя Сирокко — так зовется смертоносный ветер, что рождается в самых жарких пустынях Ифрита. Но вы — его хозя{mf|ин|йка}, так что решать вам".
"I like the name Sirocco — it is the name of a deadly wind that originates in the hottest deserts of Efreet. But you are her owner, so you should name her."
languages.original_text: "Мне нравится имя Сирокко — так зовется смертоносный ветер, что рождается в самых жарких пустынях Ифрита. Но вы — его хозя{mf|ин|йка}, так что решать вам".

traits.locale_text: "I like the name Sirocco — it is the name of a deadly wind that originates in the hottest deserts of Efreet. But you are her owner, so you should name her."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I like the name Sirocco — it is the name of a deadly wind that originates in the hottest deserts of Efreet. But you are her owner, so you should name her."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I like the name Sirocco — it is the name of a deadly wind that originates in the hottest deserts of Efreet. But you are her owner, so you should name her."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我喜欢‘西罗科’这个名字，这个词指的是艾弗里特最炎热的沙漠里吹来的狂风。不过，你才是她的主人，她的名字应该由你来定。”
languages.original_text: "I like the name Sirocco — it is the name of a deadly wind that originates in the hottest deserts of Efreet. But you are her owner, so you should name her."

traits.locale_text: “我喜欢‘西罗科’这个名字，这个词指的是艾弗里特最炎热的沙漠里吹来的狂风。不过，你才是她的主人，她的名字应该由你来定。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「シロッコって名前はお気に入りよ…その名前は、イフリートの最も暑い砂漠を吹き渡る、恐ろしい風の名前なんだ。でも、この子の飼い主はアンタなんだから、あんたが名前をつけてやってよ」
languages.original_text: "I like the name Sirocco — it is the name of a deadly wind that originates in the hottest deserts of Efreet. But you are her owner, so you should name her."

traits.locale_text: 「シロッコって名前はお気に入りよ…その名前は、イフリートの最も暑い砂漠を吹き渡る、恐ろしい風の名前なんだ。でも、この子の飼い主はアンタなんだから、あんたが名前をつけてやってよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Me gusta Sirocco como nombre. Es el de un viento letal que recorre los desiertos más calurosos de Efreet. Pero es usted su dueñ{mf|o|a}, así que debería elegir usted el nombre».
languages.original_text: "I like the name Sirocco — it is the name of a deadly wind that originates in the hottest deserts of Efreet. But you are her owner, so you should name her."

traits.locale_text: «Me gusta Sirocco como nombre. Es el de un viento letal que recorre los desiertos más calurosos de Efreet. Pero es usted su dueñ{mf|o|a}, así que debería elegir usted el nombre».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « J'aime bien "Sirocco" ; c'est le nom d'un vent mortel qui souffle dans les déserts les plus arides d'Éfrit. Mais c'est vous, son propriétaire, alors à vous de la baptiser. »
languages.original_text: "I like the name Sirocco — it is the name of a deadly wind that originates in the hottest deserts of Efreet. But you are her owner, so you should name her."

traits.locale_text: « J'aime bien "Sirocco" ; c'est le nom d'un vent mortel qui souffle dans les déserts les plus arides d'Éfrit. Mais c'est vous, son propriétaire, alors à vous de la baptiser. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich mag den Namen Sirocco – das ist der Name eines tödlichen Windes, der in den heißesten Wüsten von Efreet weht. Aber Ihr seid nun {mf|ihr Besitzer|ihre Besitzerin}, also solltet Ihr Euch einen Namen ausdenken."
languages.original_text: "I like the name Sirocco — it is the name of a deadly wind that originates in the hottest deserts of Efreet. But you are her owner, so you should name her."

traits.locale_text: "Ich mag den Namen Sirocco – das ist der Name eines tödlichen Windes, der in den heißesten Wüsten von Efreet weht. Aber Ihr seid nun {mf|ihr Besitzer|ihre Besitzerin}, also solltet Ihr Euch einen Namen ausdenken."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Sirocco ismini sevdim. İfrit'in en sıcak çöllerinden yükselen ölümcül bir rüzgârın adı. Tabii sahibi sensin, ismini sen vermelisin."
languages.original_text: "I like the name Sirocco — it is the name of a deadly wind that originates in the hottest deserts of Efreet. But you are her owner, so you should name her."

traits.locale_text: "Sirocco ismini sevdim. İfrit'in en sıcak çöllerinden yükselen ölümcül bir rüzgârın adı. Ama sahibi sensin, ismini sen vermelisin."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
